title: Threat Hunting with Timeline Fusion
subtitle: Combining disk, memory, and network timelines
learning_objectives: Build fused timelines using disk, memory, and network artefacts
Develop hunt hypotheses guided by timeline evidence
Automate queries to surface suspicious sequences
Visualise timeline data for stakeholder communication
Integrate findings into SOC detection engineering
Refine timelines based on hunt feedback

content_blocks.title: Guided Simulation

content.text:
1. Import sample disk, memory, and network artefacts into Timesketch.
2. Form a hypothesis around suspicious logon events.
3. Query and annotate timeline entries supporting or disproving the hypothesis.
4. Present results with recommended detections.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Rehearse in a safe environment before applying to production.
